page.title: 07OSSINGTONS LAW AND ORDER.
page.content: The{Nottinghamshire police}travel around the area using{patrol cars, although fortunately heavy policing is not necessary locally. The majority of the crime concerns{poaching}as the many wooded sites give ideal conditions and opportunities for this type of theft. However there has been{stealing from the{church in Ossington}in recent months. Firstly the{ecclesiastical {silver}was taken, then later{wooden {chests}disappeared from the church along with the{new vacuum cleaner. There is also occasional pilfering from farmyards and outbuildings but thankfully these are isolated incidents.
